{"name": "Sweetwater Mission Inc", "alternate_name": "", "description": "In order to receive food all you need is the following:

Bring Proof of Residency (less than 30 days old) in the form of mail, a rent receipt, or new lease.

Provide your Photo ID

Provide proof of Children that are 17 years and under.

", "email": "", "url": "https://www.sweetwatermission.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "6130 Hotel Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Austell", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "30106", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 33.8045893, "longitude": -84.64031000000001}, "phones": [{"number": "(770) 819-0662", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed early if the weather is bad"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Requires ID for adults and birth certificates for children in the household"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "A photo ID is required"}]}
